hw_api_error->reason

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi SVN)

hw_api_error->reason — Returns reason of error

Description

HW_API_Reason hw_api_error::reason ( void )

Returns the first error reason.

Return Values
